events.title: Space Electronics
events.description: 30 students: Used NASA edu resources to make simple rockets. And built DIY hexbugs from cell phone motors.

events.title: Title
events.description: The Satellite Lab participated in the "Experience UGA Science Learning Fair ", which had approx. 200 9th grade attendees. We setup a booth with a grade level appropriate booth about various space-related topics and developments in the lab.
